title: Skins Unavailable?
body:
When is Blood Moon Thresh and Elise Available. Still says Unavailable when i look to buy it.
I just want themmmmmm, hurry up and release please.
Any one have any idea when they will be available?

replies.body:
January 10th is the guess since those skins have been earmarked for the "lunar revel". They also won't release non-xmas skins during the xmas event and snowdown doesnt end until January 6th.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Lunar_Revel

Nah mate, they have been confirmed as not lunar-reveal skins as shown in this article by rioters:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/red-post-collection-poro-countdown-to.html#more

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3PfkKOA4,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-02T03:42:35.977+0000)
>
> Nah mate, they have been confirmed as not lunar-reveal skins as shown in this article by rioters:
> http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/red-post-collection-poro-countdown-to.html#more

Well Lunar Revel is in like a week, which means either Riot will flood the market with A LOT of new skins, or the Thresh/Elise skins are even longer ways away then first thought
it says 4.21 for them to release. so possibly once snowdown ends.
when the bonus rp is on I'd say
